EXTRACT TECHNOLOGY LTD 
 
Job Description 
1 Job Details 
Job Title:    After Market Service Engineer   Team: After Market  
Reports to:    After Market Manager   
Responsible for:  No employees  
2 Job Purpose 
Responsible for carrying servicing and testing of product range and ensuring compliance – 
assist in the generation of new sales. 
 
3 Duties and key responsibilities 
 
1. Servicing, revalidation and Sales Creation 
 Carry out annual servicing of all relevant product range – Isolators and Downflow 
Booths  
 Ensure correct execution of all Company documentation from Service reports to IQ/OQ 
 Carry out work activities in accordance with industry and Company specifications and 
procedures 
 Ensure that all sales prospects, enquiries, and are professionally managed and  1 
 
 
 
EXTRACT TECHNOLOGY LTD 
 
Job Description 
1 Job Details 
Job Title:    After Market Service Engineer   Team: After Market  
Reports to:    After Market Manager   
Responsible for:  No employees  
2 Job Purpose 
Responsible for carrying servicing and testing of product range and ensuring compliance – 
assist in the generation of new sales. 
 
3 Duties and key responsibilities 
 
1. Servicing, revalidation and Sales Creation 
 Carry out annual servicing of all relevant product range – Isolators and Downflow 
Booths  
 Ensure correct execution of all Company documentation from Service reports to IQ/OQ 
 Carry out work activities in accordance with industry and Company specifications and 
procedures 
 Ensure that all sales prospects, enquiries, and are professionally managed and 
delivered back to the office in accordance with procedures 
 Maintain allocated test equipment, ensure calibration is current and certification is 
available for issue to clients 
 Work within the parameters of the company production schedule 
 Submit status reports on a regular basis  
 Actively promote the after sales service 
 Assist in the generation of new sales in the Spares, Servicing, up-grades and the 
creation of new markets 
 
2. General 
 Share expertise and keep up to date with developments 
 Maintain an effective working relationship with all teams within the business 
 Contribute to the ongoing development of the business, its people and processes 
 Participate in other duties as and when required 
 Comply with all policies and procedures within the company 
 Carry out all duties with regard to and ensuring equal opportunity 
 Work with all employees within the company in the fulfillment of our aims 

2 Ensure that you remain compliant with health and safety regulations and accepted safe 
practice at all times.  Report any health and safety issues or contraventions witnessed 
anywhere within the business to your manager 
 
 
4 Person Specification 
 
Attributes  Essential  Desirable  
Experience  Air Flow Testing 
 Filter integrity testing 
 Calibration  
 Completion of Company 
documentation  
 A good attitude to promote new 
sales  Working in Engineering 
Environment. 
 From the Pharma (or 
equivalent Industry).  
 Electrical knowledge 
Qualifications  Engineering Apprenticeship 
 Engineering qualifications    HND/HNC  
 Qualifications in Testing, 
DOP, Particle counting, 
Airflows  
Skills and abilities  Good Communication Skills 
 Ability to Work on Own 
Initiative 
 Team Player 
 Attention to Detail 
 High level of Customer Service 
Skills  
  
Knowledge  Awareness of equality issues 
 Commercial Awareness in 
Accordance with Company 
Procedures 
 Awareness of Health & Safety 
 Understanding of cGMP 
 Understanding of Containment 
Solutions 
 Understanding of Health and 
Safety  
 Computer literate 
  
Additional factors  Role involves working away 
from home for periods of time 
 A van is issued for business use

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
